properties.name: Hormuz Island, Qeshm County, Hormozgan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Hormuz Island, Qeshm County, Hormozgan Province, Iran

Type: 187

Location: Iran

Island in the Strait of Hormuz, 8 kilometres off the Iranian coast. Evaporitic rocks including a nearly circular-shaped salt plug (with solution caverns) exposed at the surface with a maximum length of 7 km along its east-west axis. Hematite ore is...

properties.name: Delazian Mine, Delazian (Delagian; Dalijan; Delazeyan; Deliazan; Delaziyan), Semnan County, Semnan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Delazian Mine, Delazian (Delagian; Dalijan; Delazeyan; Deliazan; Delaziyan), Semnan County, Semnan Province, Iran

Type: 60

Location: Iran

Ref.: Rocks & Min.: 23: 225; Bureau of Mines Mineral Trade Notes (Oct, 1947). A sulfur mine in siliceous stone. Produced about 700 metric tons of sulfur per year.

View on Mindat.org

properties.name: Bostaneh Mine, Bostaneh, Bandar Lengeh, Bandar Lengeh County, Hormozgan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Bostaneh Mine, Bostaneh, Bandar Lengeh, Bandar Lengeh County, Hormozgan Province, Iran

Type: 60

Location: Iran

A sulfur mine located near Bandar-e Lengeh (Bandar-e Langeh; Bandar Langeh; Lengeh; Linja; Lingeh; Linjah). Produced about 5 to 10 tons of sulfur per month (1947 timeframe).

View on Mindat.org

properties.name: Deh Hosein prospect (Deh Hosein mine), Astaneh, Shazand County, Markazi Province, Iran
properties.description:
Deh Hosein prospect (Deh Hosein mine), Astaneh, Shazand County, Markazi Province, Iran

Type: 73

Location: Iran

A copper-tin deposit, already mined in ancient times, with high contents of gold, hosted in Mesozoic schists and phyllites at the southern contact of the Astaneh intrusive complex. Located southwest of Astaneh.
